mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Google_Review ( google_review_id, google_map_place_id, author_name, rating, content, review_time, created_at) VALUES (google_review_seq.nextval, #{googleReview.placeId}, #{googleReview.authorName}, #{googleReview.rating}, #{googleReview.content}, #{googleReview.reviewTime}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE Google_Review SET google_map_place_id = #{googleReview.placeId}, author_name = #{googleReview.authorName}, rating = #{googleReview.rating}, content = #{googleReview.reviewText}, review_time = #{googleReview.reviewTime} WHERE google_review_id = #{googleReview.id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Google_Review WHERE created_at < TRUNC(SYSDATE) - #{numberOfDays}
